form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: All buildings closed until May 1st, as directed by Governor DeWine. Check back for updates.

a.span: Logo link to home page, panther in red and white circle

div.a: Updates on district plans and the Coronavirus

div.span: No school through Friday, May 1st. Please read the latest updates related to our plans for the district and the impact of Covid-19.

We know students and parents may have questions and concerns as this situation evolves. We are working hard to adapt, provide services for our students and be a stable resource for the community. Submit your questions for district administration here related to school closure. We will update as questions arise...
Breakfast and lunch will be available for all Manchester students who need meals during this time. See details here...

div.a: Updated message for MHS students and parents

div.span: Thursday, April 2, 2020 - Please watch this announcement from MHS!
In recognition of Academic Excellence, we are proud to present our Class of 2020 "Top 10" students! Please accept our congratulations and appreciation for your hard work.
Download next year's school calendar here....
Do you have a child starting Kindergarten next year?....
This month's "Panthers on the Prowl" were nominated for being "Helpful"

em.span: Welcome to Panther Country, the home of the Manchester Local Schools...
